import React from 'react' import { Card, Button, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from './Rating' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Product({ product }) { const addToCartHandler = () => { history.push(`/cart/${match.params.id}?qty=${qty}`) } return ( {product.name}
${product.price} ) } export default Product
